|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43236; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The Linksys E2500 was a router released by Linksys around April 2011. It features a Broadcom BCM43236 dual-band wireless chip. It has 4, 10/100 ethernet ports, and a single 10/100 WAN port.
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31578-cisco-linksys-e2500-advanced-dual-band-n-router-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :"3763-30000302R" or "3763-30000303R" is silkscreened on the board.
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=138322 Linksys/Cisco E2500 for DD-WRT] On the '''DD-WRT''' forums *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=90346 New Linksys Router (E1200; E1500; E2500; E3200)] On the '''DD-WRT''' forums *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=140536 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] :C0:C1:C0 OUI and 300MHz CPU in the boot log
The E2500v1 would [http://tomato.groov.pl/?page_id=69 appear to be <small>experimentally</small> supported by ''Shibby'''s '''Tomato''' RT-N builds].
The E2500v1 is [http://victek.is-a-geek.com] supported. Victek RAF versions.
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = K26 build 18946 20120407 :[[dd-wrt-wiki:Linksys_E2500]] On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki
K26 build 18946 20120407 no 5 GHz
Please insert instructions here
===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_e2500_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/e2500_v1 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=46097 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 22.03.4 |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_2.4ghz WiFi 2.4GHz], [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_5ghz WiFi 5GHz] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
===Flashing Tomato=== K26RT-N (SDK5.110) FreshTomato
NVRAM is limited to 32kB
Please insert instructions here
